General_Description: '''Little Fists of Rage''' was a virtual representation of one of [[Kassandra]]'s genetic memories, relived by [[Layla Hassan]] through the Portable [[Animus|Animus HR-8.5]].
Section_Description: On a [[message board]], Kassandra found a note about a contract: "If given the chance, [[Sparta]]n [[Brute]]s will dominate the battlefield. They can't have that chance."
Section_Outcome: Kassandra sought out and slew Spartan Brutes all over [[Greece]], gaining rewards for doing this.
Section_Behind_the_scenes: This very same contract appears also under the names [[Brutal Force]] and [[Target of Choice – Spartan Brutes]].
Section_References:
*''[[Assassin's Creed: Odyssey]]''
